Class FindMatchingCandidates

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
FindMatchingCandidates
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet("/FindMatchingCandidates")
public class FindMatchingCandidates
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Servlet implementation class FindMatchingCandidates. This servlet is for assesing the voter's answer so at the end the suitable candidates can be listed. Will redirect to the questionnaireResults.jsp view page. questionnaireResults.jsp
Author:
HAMK's Finest
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • init

      public void init()
      Object initialization method for Dao_qanswer class see dao.Dao_qanswer.java User/pass: pena/kukkuu
      Overrides:
      init in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet

    • returnCndAnswersStacked

      public java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> returnCndAnswersStacked()
      This method will return a stacked arraylist from the databse which conatins all the existing ansers selected by the candidates.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of QAnswer type, containing all candidate answer stored in the databse.

    • returnCndProfileStacked

      public java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> returnCndProfileStacked()
      This method will fetch all existing candidate profile from the database using DAO object.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Candidate type

    • scoreStackedData

      public java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> scoreStackedData​(java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> answerList, java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> selectionList)
      This method will compare the candidate answers (all candidates) with the voter's answers and will score them. The last QAnswer object for each candidate will be amnended with a total score as well. This will be used for making a score board to select the best candidates.
      Parameters:
      answerList - takes arg arraylist QAnswer instance with attributes containing candidate answers
      selectionList - takes arg arraylist QAnswer instance with attributes containing voter's answers.
      Returns:
      ARrayList of QAnswer type.

    • findBestCnds

      public java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> findBestCnds​(java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> scoredStackedData)
      This method will sort the scored candidates based on the last QAnswer object's totalScore property. The returned arraylist will contain the last QAnswer object for each candidate sorted by the totalScore value. Later the candidate ID can be collected from this score board.
      Parameters:
      scoredStackedData - takes arg QAnswer arraylist instance with attributes containing score values.
      Returns:
      ARrayList of QAnswer type

    • getCndIdFromScoreBoard

      public int getCndIdFromScoreBoard​(int rankAchieved, java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> scoreBoard)
      This method will return the candidate id based on the rank you add as a parameter. For example, if you choose 1, you will get the 1st candidate's ID. 2 => 2nd...etc
      Parameters:
      rankAchieved - takes arg int of position to return.
      scoreBoard - takes arg QAnswer arraylist instance containing total score and candidate attributes.
      Returns:
      candidate_id as an int for the selected rank.

    • sliceFromStacked

      public java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> sliceFromStacked​(int candidateId, java.util.ArrayList<QAnswer> scoredStackedData)
      This method will return all the answers for the given candidate from the stacked ArrayList. It will be used to display candidate selections after the voter has taken the quastionnaire.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - takes arg int of CANDIDATE_ID.
      scoredStackedData - takes arg of QAnswer arraylist object with attributes containing total score and all answers.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of QAnswer type, only for the selected candidate.

    • returnCndProfile

      public Candidate returnCndProfile​(int candidateId, java.util.ArrayList<Candidate> candidateProfileStacked)
      This method will slice and return the selected candidates profile from the stacked data.
      Parameters:
      candidateId - takes arg int of CANDIDATE_ID to search by.
      candidateProfileStacked - takes arg Candidate arraylist instance with attributes containing all candidate info from candidates table.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Candidate type, conatining the selected candidate profile data.
